translation.en: [William] Once upon a time, fairy tales were awesome.
translation.fr: Il était une fois, les contes étaient prenants.

translation.en: We know, you don't believe us.
You think fairy tales are cute and pink and full of fairies.
translation.fr: Pour vous, ce sont des histoires à l'eau de rose lénifiantes.

translation.en: -[whacks] -Well, they're not.
-Real fairy tales are scary. -[thuds]
translation.fr: Les vrais contes font très peur.

translation.en: Follow two children as they venture off into a dark tale.
translation.fr: Suivez donc les aventures lugubres de ces deux enfants.

translation.en: -A scary tale. -[barking] -A strange tale. -[howls]
translation.fr: Leur histoire aussi grinçante que terrifiante.

translation.en: -[shrieks] -A… Wait a minute. Are you even old enough for this?
-[thudding] -You really think you can handle it?
You've been warned.
Don't blame me if you can't sleep tonight.
translation.fr: Tant pis si vous faites des cauchemars.

translation.en: All right then, you're weird.
You might as well settle in.
It's time for A Tale Dark and Grimm.
translation.fr: Et découvrez la face sinistre des contes de Grimm.

translation.en: I don't know. So far the story is not that awesome.
translation.fr: Mouais. Pour l'instant, l'histoire n'est pas géniale.

translation.en: Come on, he hasn't even started yet.
Let's dive right in, shall we? [clears throat]
Once upon a time, in the kingdom of Grimm, there were two children…
translation.fr: Il était une fois, au royaume de Grimm, vivaient deux enfants…

translation.en: [William] Hansel…
Come out, come out, wherever you are.
translation.fr: Sortez, sortez, où que vous soyez !

translation.en: Gotcha!
…and Gretel.
You probably think you know their story.
translation.fr: Vous croyez connaître leur histoire, hein ?

translation.en: I don't think you do. Not the real story.
translation.fr: Mais vous avez tort. Pas la vraie, du moins.

translation.en: -Never heard of them. -They lived with their mother, the Queen…
translation.fr: C'est qui ? Ils vivaient avec leur mère, la reine…

translation.en: Story time.
…and their father, the King.
I'm the dragon!
[William] Their parents loved them very much.
They were a happy, little family.
Until the dragon came.
I'll protect you.
Don't worry, it's only a story.
[queen] ♪ When the darkness opens wide ♪
♪ Swallowing up the sun inside ♪
-[crows cawing] -♪ Dabbled stars, they prick the sky ♪
translation.fr: En avalant le soleil Étoiles sombres piqueront le ciel

translation.en: ♪ Blanket on which the moon will lie ♪
[William] Which is why it was fairly surprising…
…when their father cut off their heads.
translation.fr: que leur père leur coupe la tête.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa! You can't tell that part of the story, William.
translation.fr: Ouah ! Tu ne peux pas raconter ça, William.

translation.en: There are kids out there.
I mean, look at that one over there. How old could you be? Seven?
translation.fr: Comme cet enfant-ci. Tu as quel âge ? Sept ans ?

translation.en: How else is he gonna learn what's inside a person's neck?
translation.fr: Il faut bien lui montrer ce qu'il y a dans nos cous !

translation.en: [whispers] It's mostly blood.
translation.fr: Il y a surtout du sang.

translation.en: [chuckles] We're gonna show it.
Tastefully!
-What? Too soon? -[clears throat]
You might think that this was the end of the tale of Hansel and Gretel.
translation.fr: On pourrait penser que c'était la fin de l'histoire de Hansel et Gretel.

translation.en: -In fact, it was just the beginning. -[sniffling] Is this really going to work?
translation.fr: Mais en fait, ce n'était que le début. Ça va vraiment marcher ?

translation.en: It will. It has to!
-And… done. -[twangs, tinkles]
So, up and at 'em. [clapping encouragingly]
-Oh. -Here you go.
-[gasps softly] Oh… -Gretel? Hansel? Please!
Oh, how could we ever have believed this would bring them back?
translation.fr: Comment avons-nous pu croire que ça les ramènerait ?

translation.en: [cries] What have we done?
-What? -[shudders]
Children, you're…
awake!
[hesitantly] So, who wants chocolate cake?
translation.fr: Alors, qui veut un gâteau au chocolat ?

translation.en: -I guess a slice would be-- -[chuckles nervously]
No, thank you, Father.
-But Gretel… -[yawns]
We're very tired, and also we don't remember what happened just now,
translation.fr: On est fatigués, et on ne se rappelle pas ce qui vient d'arriver,

translation.en: in case you were wondering.
-I think we'll just go to bed. -I'm not tired.
translation.fr: - On va sdormir. - J'ai pas sommeil.

translation.en: -Good night. Love you guys. Sleep well. -[muffled]
translation.fr: Bonne nuit. Je vous aime. Dormez bien.

translation.en: -It worked. It really worked. -Do you think they noticed anything?
translation.fr: Ça a marché. Ça a vraiment marché. Ils ont remarqué, tu crois ?

translation.en: -Hurry, Hansel. -[panting] We have to get out of here.
translation.fr: Vite, Hansel. On doit sortir d'ici.

translation.en: -[grunts] -Why would they do that? Don't they love us anymore?
translation.fr: Mais pourquoi ? Ils nous aiment plus ?

translation.en: You don't cut off the heads of things you love.
translation.fr: On coupe pas la tête de ce qu'on aime.

translation.en: [sniffling] You do with flowers. We must have done something bad.
translation.fr: Pour les fleurs, si. On a dû faire une bêtise.

translation.en: -[gentle music playing] -Something really bad.
This isn't because of us. It's them. They're awful, evil!
translation.fr: C'est pas notre faute. C'est eux. Ils sont horribles, maléfiques !

translation.en: Parents shouldn't slay their children. Not even once.
translation.fr: On ne doit pas occire ses enfants. Même pas une fois.

translation.en: I-- I shouldn't even have to say that.
Hansel, we have to get out of here.
But where are we gonna go?
I don't know, but we'll figure it out, together.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas, mais on va trouver, ensemble.

translation.en: Will it be an adventure?
-[upbeat music plays] -That I can promise.
And don't worry, I will always protect my little brother.
translation.fr: Ne t'inquiète pas, je protégerai mon petit frère.

translation.en: No.
-I'll protect you. -[heroic music plays]
And I'm not your little brother. You're only two minutes older than me.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas le plus jeune ! T'as que deux minutes de plus.

translation.en: Almost three.
Do you trust me?
Let's do it.
-[both] Adventure! -[door knob rattling]
-[Hansel gasps] Oh, no. -[Gretel] They're coming. Come! Quick!
translation.fr: - Oh, non. - Ils arrivent. Viens ! Vite !

translation.en: Rug! Now!
-[dramatic music plays] -[grunts, yelps]
-[both] Ah! -What did you tie the other end to?
This… is going to be fine.
Who's that weirdo? Why is he wearing a cloak? [squawks]
translation.fr: C'est qui, ce mec bizarre ? Pourquoi il porte une cape ?

translation.en: This is supposed to be… -[dramatically] …mysterious. -[intriguing music plays]
Scared and confused, Hansel and Gretel made their way
translation.fr: Effrayés et confus, Hansel et Gretel

translation.en: through the quiet village.
Gretel, what are we gonna do?
Trust me. I have a plan.
We are going to find better parents, perfect parents.
translation.fr: On va trouver de meilleurs parents, des parents parfaits.

translation.en: Like ones who won't kill us so much?
translation.fr: Des parents qui ne nous tueront pas ?

translation.en: Exactly.
Okay, you know that woman who delivers bread to the castle?
translation.fr: Tu vois la femme qui livre le pain au château ?

translation.en: The one who always gives us chocolate cake?
translation.fr: Celui qui nous donne du gâteau ?

translation.en: Mrs. Baker?
I was thinking she'd make a perfect new mother.
translation.fr: Je pense qu'elle ferait une nouvelle mère parfaite.

translation.en: Yeah. Chocolate cake is like love.
translation.fr: Oui. Le gâteau, c'est de l'amour.

translation.en: Mom and Dad used to give us chocolate cake.
translation.fr: Nos parents nous en donnaient, avant.

translation.en: -Do you think they still loved us then? -I don't know, Hansel. [sighs] Now, look…
translation.fr: Ils nous aimaient encore ? Je n'en sais rien. Bon, regarde…

translation.en: Mrs. Baker lives right here.
Uh, what's this we have to go through?
[Gretel] It says, "deep dark woods."
Maybe we should go back home.
If we just knew why Mom and Dad did what they did, maybe--
translation.fr: Si on savait pourquoi papa et maman ont fait ça…

translation.en: Hansel, do you really want to get your head cut off again?
translation.fr: Hansel, tu veux te refaire couper la tête ?

translation.en: Just do what I do.
Take all your feelings and put them in a box.
translation.fr: Mets tes émotions dans une boîte.

translation.en: -Lock and bury it and set fire to it. -What?
-Okay. -Never think about them again.
translation.fr: - Et n'y pense plus jamais. - Euh…

translation.en: How can I set fire to the box after I buried it?
translation.fr: Comment la brûler si elle est enterrée ?

translation.en: Hansel! We are going to find the perfect parents whatever it takes.
translation.fr: Hansel ! On trouvera les parents parfaits, quoi qu'il en coûte.

translation.en: And then…
Mom and Dad will be sorry.
Let's go. Stay close.
translation.fr: Allons-y. Ne t'éloigne pas de moi.

translation.en: [William] And so Hansel and Gretel made their way
translation.fr: Et ainsi, Hansel et Gretel ont traversé

translation.en: through the deep dark woods
-to find the perfect family. -[ominous music plays]
[raspy, whooshing voice] One of us.
[stammers] Who's there?
[whimpers] I'm armed!
D-did you hear that?
It's-- It's just the wind.
Wait!
They're in my hair! Get them off me!
Shoo! Get out of here.
Gross. One of them kissed me! [splutters]
translation.fr: Dégueu. Y en a une qui m'a embrassée !

translation.en: Okay, we have to find somewhere we can rest for the night.
translation.fr: Bon, on doit trouver un endroit où dormir.

translation.en: It's too dark to go on.
-[magical tinkling] -Look. It's glowing.
This is crazy!
Sewing someone's head back on should not bring them back to life.
translation.fr: Recoudre la tête d'un mort ne devrait pas le ressusciter.

translation.en: It's some kind of magic thread.
Modern medicine is amazing.
Gretel, I have a bad feeling about this place.
translation.fr: Gretel, cet endroit m'inquiète un peu.

translation.en: Just a thought, instead of resting, we could keep walking forever and ever
translation.fr: En fait, au lieu de nous reposer, on pourrait juste marcher

translation.en: and please, please not stop in the deep dark woods.
translation.fr: et ne pas s'arrêter dans la forêt.

translation.en: -No. We need rest. -[gentle music plays]
translation.fr: Non. On a besoin de repos.

translation.en: And Hansel, I know you can keep me safe.
translation.fr: Et Hansel, je sais que tu peux me protéger.

translation.en: -Okay, I can do this. -[snoring]
Yeah. All I've gotta do is keep my eyes wide open…
translation.fr: Oui. Tout ce que j'ai à faire, c'est de garder les yeux ouverts

translation.en: [yawning] …all night long.
[raspy, whooshing voice] One of us.
Wolves.
[gasps] Gretel? Gretel?
Would you rather die awake or in your sleep?
Why would you ask?
[softly] In my sleep.
Too late!
-Stay back! Stay back! -[wolves whine]
Take this!
I'm sorry I got us into this!
translation.fr: Pardon de nous avoir entraînés là-dedans !

translation.en: If I have to die again, I'm glad it's with you.
translation.fr: Si je dois remourir, ravi que ce soit avec toi.

translation.en: Wait, did that sound like I'm glad you're dying?
translation.fr: Attends, non, je veux pas que tu meures !

translation.en: I wasn't paying attention!
Stay away! I'm warning you!
-[both] Run! -[suspenseful music plays]
[panting] That way!
We gotta get across.
I can't do it! I can't do it!
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas faire ça !

translation.en: -You have to. Take my hand! -[wolves barking]
translation.fr: Il le faut. Prends ma main !

translation.en: -Come on! -[whimpers]
-[snarling] -[straining] Help me!
-[snarling] -Oh no.
-Oh, no, no, no, no, no, no. -Ah!
Bad day to be a wolf.
-Wow! -[chuckles] You two all right?
Those wolves will take a piece of you if you give 'em half a chance.
translation.fr: Ces loups vous mangeront si vous leur donnez une chance.

translation.en: Here. You must be freezin'.
-Thank you. -Thanks.
Sir? We're looking for a Mrs. Baker.
translation.fr: Monsieur, on cherche une Mme Fourneau.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Yeah, her cottage is a day's walk that way.
translation.fr: Oh, oui. Oui, son chalet est à une journée de marche, par là.

translation.en: You can't miss it.
Uh, are you two kids alone?
I'm only asking 'cause you look like you need a place to stay.
translation.fr: Je demande parce que vous avez l'air d'avoir besoin d'un abri où dormir.

translation.en: We've got plenty of room on the farm for the both of you
translation.fr: On a plein de place à la ferme pour vous deux

translation.en: and plenty of turnips.
[whispers] Hansel, a turnip farmer.
Or a cake baker.
[both] We have a winner.
-No, thank you, sir. -But we appreciate your help.
translation.fr: - Merci, mais non. - Mais c'est gentil.

translation.en: Oh, that's too bad.
We'll be there, if you change your minds.
Thanks. Bye.
See ya.
Hansel and Gretel continued on
translation.fr: Hansel et Gretel poursuivent leur chemin,

translation.en: unaware that they were being followed by
-him. -[sinister music plays]
A day later, Hansel and Gretel emerged from the forest
translation.fr: Le lendemain, Hansel et Gretel émergent de la forêt

translation.en: exhausted and hungrier than they had ever been in their lives.
translation.fr: épuisés et plus affamés qu'ils ne l'avaient jamais été.

translation.en: You want some turnip sack? The sweaty part is salty and good.
translation.fr: Tu veux un bout de navet ? La partie suante est bonne et salée.

translation.en: Hansel, are you seeing what I'm seeing?
translation.fr: Hansel, tu vois ce que je vois ?

translation.en: -[exciting music builds] -Is that… a cake-house?
translation.fr: C'est… une maison en pain d'épices ?

translation.en: I'm going to find out.
With my mouth!
Children!
-Oh, I just love… -[whimsical music plays]
-…children! -[knife whooshes]
-[pleasant music plays] -Try the fence, my widdle sugar-puffs.
translation.fr: Goûtez à la clôture, mes petits choux à la crème.

translation.en: -It's peppermint candy cane! -[kids chuckle in relief]
translation.fr: C'est du sucre d'orge à la menthe !

translation.en: Thank you, ma'am. I'm sorry we screamed.
-We thought you were gonna chop us up. -Hansel!
translation.fr: - On a cru finir hachés. - Hansel !

translation.en: Chop you up? Why?
I love children.
-They're so… sweet. -[suspenseful music plays]
Oh, give me a break.
I know we're doing a "Is she nice or is she evil?" thing,
translation.fr: Je sais qu'on fait le coup du "Est-elle gentille ou méchante ?",

translation.en: but come on!
Everyone knows this story. She's a witch who eats children.
translation.fr: Tout le monde connaît l'histoire. C'est une sorcière mangeuse d'enfants.

translation.en: What's wrong with that? Children are so sweet and juicy.
translation.fr: Quel est le problème ? Les enfants sont si doux et juteux.

translation.en: She's not a witch. She is a perfectly ordinary woman
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas une sorcière. C'est une femme ordinaire…

translation.en: who eats children.
You see, once she had a child of her own.
translation.fr: Vous voyez, elle avait un enfant à elle…

translation.en: And she did what parents so often do…
translation.fr: Elle a fait ce que les parents font souvent…

translation.en: Oh… [kisses] …look at you, you are so sweet.
translation.fr: Oh, regarde-toi, tu es à croquer !

translation.en: But she took it just a little bit farther.
translation.fr: Mais elle est allée un peu plus loin.

translation.en: I could just eat you right up, yes, I could. [kissing]
translation.fr: Je pourrais te manger tout cru !

translation.en: -Ooh, oh, I could… just eat you up. -[tense music plays]
translation.fr: Oh, je pourrais vraiment te dévorer tout cru.

translation.en: Thus, her beloved child became several rather delicious pies.
translation.fr: Ainsi, son enfant bien-aimé s'est changé en délicieuses tartes.

translation.en: And once you've developed a taste for children…
translation.fr: Et quand on a pris goût aux enfants…

translation.en: …it's a hard habit to give up.
Come in, sweet ones. Come, come, come.
Stay for dinner. -Stay as long as you like. -[hopeful music plays]
translation.fr: Restez pour le dîner. Restez aussi longtemps que vous voulez.

translation.en: Stay forever.
[laughs] Sit.
Let me bring you a little snack. You must be hungry.
translation.fr: Je vais vous apporter à manger. Vous devez avoir faim.

translation.en: What brings you to my little cottage, my sweethearts?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui vous amène chez moi, mes petits choux ?

translation.en: Our parents chopped our heads off.
translation.fr: - Nos parents nous ont décapités. - Ah ?

translation.en: -[clattering] -Really? How inconsiderate. Ha!
translation.fr: - Nos parents nous ont décapités. - Ah ? C'est si indélicat.

translation.en: We're looking for the perfect family. Or at least one that won't kill us.
translation.fr: On cherche la famille parfaite. Une qui ne nous tuera pas.

translation.en: And will let us eat chocolate cake whenever we want.
translation.fr: Et qui nous laissera manger du gâteau quand on veut.

translation.en: And never make us do chores.
Well, I have some… [in sing-song] …cake for you now!
translation.fr: Eh bien, j'ai du gâteau pour vous !

translation.en: And just about everything you could ever desire.
translation.fr: Et tout ce que vous pourriez désirer.

translation.en: How's that for a happily ever after?
translation.fr: Soyez heureux jusqu'à la fin des temps !

translation.en: Ma'am, may we eat like animals?
You do you, baby.
[William] Hansel and Gretel had found something to replace their parents' love:
translation.fr: Nos jumeaux avaient trouvé de quoi remplacer l'amour de leurs parents,

translation.en: food.
-[slurps] -Really just a lot of food.
-Eat up. -[both] Mmm.
This. That. Some of this. Some of that. Eat my sweets.
translation.fr: Ça. Et ça. Et un peu de ça. Et ça aussi. Tenez, des gâteaux.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -[yawns] This is very good cake. [groans]
[sleepily] Mmm. Yeah.
She must really love us, right?
translation.fr: Elle doit vraiment nous aimer, non ?

translation.en: Yeah.
Remember when Mom and Dad played hide-and-seek with us?
translation.fr: Tu sais, quand on jouait à cache-cache avec papa et maman ?

translation.en: [gulps] Do you think they still loved us then?
translation.fr: Ils nous aimaient encore, tu crois ?

translation.en: I don't know, Hansel.
We have Mrs. Baker now. Everything is fine.
translation.fr: On a Mme Fourneau, maintenant. Tout va bien.

translation.en: Here you go, my sugar plums.
Eat those pies up…
♪ And get nice and plump and juicy ♪
translation.fr: Et devenez bien ronds et juteux

translation.en: ♪ Chubby, chubby kids ♪
Oh, look at my sweepy widdle muffins.
translation.fr: Oh, regardez-moi ces petits muffins endormis.

translation.en: Come, I have a lovely room ready for you with great, soft beds.
translation.fr: Venez, j'ai une belle chambre pour vous avec des lits douillets.

translation.en: Good night, sleep tight.
Don't let the bed bugs bite.
translation.fr: Vous serez bien entre ces murs.

translation.en: Not until you're…
ripe.
We did it, Hansel. -[beds creaking] -We found the perfect family.
translation.fr: On a réussi, Hansel. On a trouvé la famille parfaite.

translation.en: [slurring] And she's so pretty.
I love her so much.
How come is the closet full of children's shoes?
translation.fr: Pourquoi le placard est plein de chaussures pour enfants ?

translation.en: Eh… Kids are always losing things.
translation.fr: Les enfants perdent plein de trucs.

translation.en: That one has a foot in it.
translation.fr: Celle-là a encore un pied dedans.

translation.en: -[chuckles] A little foot leg. -[ominous sting]
[chuckles] Don't worry about it. [slurring] It's fine.
My plan worked perfect and everything's fine.
translation.fr: Mon plan a fonctionné parfaitement et tout va bien.

translation.en: If you say so.
Good night. [snores]
Wakey wakey.
-Foody-oot. Food, food. -[sleepy mumbling]
-Yay! -Food!
-[both munching] -Mmm. Yes. Eat up, little piggies, eat up!
translation.fr: Oui. Mangez, mes petits cochons, mangez !

translation.en: Those ham hocks ain't gonna fatten themselves. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Ces jambons ne vont pas grossir seuls.

translation.en: [William] Digesting so much food took a lot of energy.
translation.fr: Digérer autant de nourriture consomme beaucoup d'énergie.

translation.en: After a while this left very little energy for Hansel and Gretel's brains.
translation.fr: Ça a fini par ne laisser que peu d'énergie aux cerveaux de Hansel et Gretel.

translation.en: That was when Mrs. Baker decided…
translation.fr: C'est là que Mme Fourneau a décidé…

translation.en: -[dramatic sting] -…they were ripe.
[in sing-song] Oh, Hansel.
Is that you, food?
I need your help in the kitchen, honey pie.
translation.fr: J'ai besoin de ton aide en cuisine.

translation.en: -Okay. -[suspenseful music plays]
-There's food there, right? -[Mrs. Baker] Uh-huh. Yeah.
translation.fr: La nourriture m'y attend, hein ? Oui, bien sûr.

translation.en: Be a lamb and get in the oven
translation.fr: Mon doux agneau, entre dans le four

translation.en: and tell me when it's hot enough to bake you and your sister, will you?
translation.fr: et dis-moi quand il sera assez chaud pour vous cuire, ta sœur et toi.

translation.en: -[ominous music plays] -There's a widdle boofy-woops.
How will I know when it's hot enough?
You'll die.
-Hey. -[Mrs. Baker] Yes?
If I'm dead, how will I tell you it's hot enough?
translation.fr: Si je suis mort, comment je pourrai vous le dire ?

translation.en: [Mrs. Baker] I'll smell you cooking.
M'kay.
-Whew, boy, whew. -[hot air hisses]
Wow. Something smells delicious.
translation.fr: Ouah. Quelque chose sent très bon.

translation.en: It's me that smells delicious.
Oh, it's just you, pocket pork chop.
translation.fr: C'est toi, la côtelette de porc dans ma poche.

translation.en: Wait a second.
Dying is bad!
No! Hot, hot, hot, hot!
How are you doing in there, my widdle dumpwing?
translation.fr: Comment ça va là-dedans, mon canard en sucre ?

translation.en: Uh-- Uh, just fine. Nearly dead now.
I don't smell you yet!
translation.fr: Je ne te sens pas encore !

translation.en: [William] Hansel hardly had any brainpower left.
translation.fr: Hansel n'avait presque plus de cerveau,

translation.en: But he had just enough to trick Mrs. Baker
translation.fr: mais juste assez pour duper Mme Fourneau

translation.en: into opening the oven door.
translation.fr: et lui faire ouvrir la porte du four.

translation.en: There it is.
My dear little piggie.
-Heads up! Ha! Get baked! -[screams]
[Mrs. Baker] No! No!
-[suspenseful music plays] -You ungrateful little swine!
-Gretel, wake up! We have to go! -[groans]
translation.fr: Gretel, réveille-toi ! On doit y aller !

translation.en: Food?
-She tried to cook me! We have to go! -Wait. What's going on?
translation.fr: - Elle a voulu me tuer. Vite. - Quoi ? Attends !

translation.en: Oven… doors… don't… lock!
translation.fr: Les portes du four ne se verrouillent pas !

translation.en: Sweeties!
Hansel?
Hansel!
Do you really want to know when your parents stopped loving you?
translation.fr: Tu veux vraiment savoir quand tes parents ont arrêté de t'aimer ?

translation.en: The answer is quite simple.
[inhales] Obvious, really.
They never loved you. Never. Never. Never.
translation.fr: Ils ne t'ont jamais aimé. Jamais au grand jamais.

translation.en: You know it's true.
Eat this! [grunts]
-[both gasp] -Um, maybe she's okay?
-Uh… -Maybe she's okay. [chuckles]
[gasps] Oh, she is not okay.
translation.fr: Non, elle ne va pas bien du tout.

translation.en: Mmm. Candy canes never looked so good.
translation.fr: Le plus beau des sucres d'orge !

translation.en: Would you please just…
[sighs] Forget it.
Can we just check in on the children who are watching this right now?
translation.fr: Vérifions que les enfants qui nous regardent vont bien.

translation.en: Are you guys all okay out there?
How about that little kid? You.
You're still here?
A woman just got impaled on a peppermint stick.
translation.fr: Une femme s'est empalée sur un sucre d'orge.

translation.en: Why would he not leave? I give up.
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu es encore là ? J'abandonne.

translation.en: I like that kid.
And so Hansel and Gretel got far away from that place as quickly as they could.
translation.fr: Ainsi, Hansel et Gretel se sont éloignés de cet endroit le plus vite possible.

translation.en: It's true, isn't it? Mom and Dad never loved us.
translation.fr: C'est vrai, n'est-ce pas ? Papa et maman nous ont jamais aimés.

translation.en: But that means we did the right thing. We just didn't pick the right parent.
translation.fr: Donc on a fait le bon choix. On s'est juste trompés de parent.

translation.en: That's the reason my plan didn't work.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que mon plan a échoué.

translation.en: -[hopeful music playing] -We need someone more down to earth.
translation.fr: Il nous faut quelqu'un de plus terre à terre.

translation.en: [gasps] Like that farmer!
Nothing's more down to earth than turnips.
translation.fr: Rien n'est plus terre à terre que les navets.

translation.en: We can do this. We can find a better family.
translation.fr: On peut le faire. On peut trouver une meilleure famille.

translation.en: A perfect family. Are you with me?
translation.fr: Une famille parfaite. Tu es avec moi ?

translation.en: We're never going back. It's you and me forever.
translation.fr: On n'y retournera jamais. C'est toi et moi, pour toujours.

translation.en: -[whimsical violin music plays] -[laughs, inhales] Hello.
We meet again.
[groans] Unfortunately.
Two children were here, two unusual children.
translation.fr: Deux enfants étaient là, deux enfants inhabituels.

translation.en: They are mine.
[laughs] Oh, you can have them, for now.
translation.fr: Oh, je te les laisse, pour l'instant.

translation.en: That's not what I'm here for.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas là pour ça.

translation.en: Oh, yes, you should carry on.
Have a fantabulous trip.
translation.fr: Je te souhaite un fantabuleux voyage.

translation.en: [in ghostly voice] Um, hello? H-- Hello?
So, wait. -What's going on here? -[whooshes]
translation.fr: Attends, il se passe quoi, là ?

translation.en: Nothing good.
Me? Wait, no. But I'm-- But I'm not ripe yet.
translation.fr: Moi ? Attendez, non ! Je ne suis pas encore mûre !

translation.en: No. But you are done.
Nailed it.
[William] Under a sunny sky, Hansel and Gretel arrived at the turnip farm.
translation.fr: Sous un ciel ensoleillé, Hansel et Gretel sont arrivés à la ferme.

translation.en: That farmer seemed like a no-nonsense guy.
I'm sure he'll be completely normal.
translation.fr: Je suis sûre qu'il sera normal.

translation.en: Not weird at all.
Hello, children.
This is fine.
